name: Susume! Taisen Pazurudama
overview: Susume! Taisen Puzzle-Dama (進め！対戦ぱずるだま), also know as Let's Attack Crazy Cross, is a Japan exclusive puzzle game which was developed and published by Konami. It was originally released for arcade and PlayStation in 1996. In 1998 it was re-released for the PlayStation with a slightly different cover. It was later released on mobile phones in 2003. It is part of the Taisen Puzzle-Dama series.
